ComicInfo.Penciller: Herb Trimpe,Art Adams,Frank Cho,John Buscema,Art Adams,Frank Cho,Herb Trimpe,John Buscema
ComicInfo.Summary:
Where Monsters Dwell: The Red Hulk battles and kills a Wendigo.
Wait Until Dark: She-Hulk is beaten by the Red Hulk and makes plans to go after him again.
The Death and Life of the Abomination: After the Red Hulk kills the Abomination, Bruce Banner thinks about his long history with one of his greatest foes.
And the Wind Howls...Wendigo!: Hulk is in Canada looking for some peace and quiet when he is mysteriously drawn to a cave inhabited by the sister of the man who became the Wendigo. Marie and Georges plan on transferring the power of the Wendigo to the Hulk, thus restoring Paul Cartier to his normal life. Marie's magic isn't strong enough, however, and just as Wendigo shows up, the Hulk wakes up from his magical slumber and the two battle. The Canadian government gets involved and sends in their own agent to take care of a recent Hulk sighting, the mutant known as Wolverine.
And Now...The Wolverine!: Canadian super-agent Wolverine teams up with the Hulk to battle Wendigo. Once the monster is felled, however, Wolverine turns on the Hulk and the two battle. Marie goes ahead with her plans of trying to transfer the power of the Wendigo into the Hulk but when the guilt becomes too much for best friend Georges who feels responsible for Paul's monstrous condition, he works the change on himself. Paul Cartier is returned to human form and Georges becomes the Wendigo.
Come on in, the Revolution's Fine: Valkyrie shows up at Avengers HQ and convinces Wasp and the Scarlet Witch to join her team of Lady Liberators. With the male members of the Avengers attending Tom Fagan's Halloween parade, the Masters of Evil attack and pummel our heroes. The Lady Liberators show up to save the day and do what their male chauvinist pig counterparts failed to do as they make quick work of the villains. Valkyrie is revealed to be the Enchantress, however, and the lady heroes are forced to defeat their former leader. The gender war rages on.
ComicInfo.Title: Where Monsters Dwell; Wait Until Dark; The Death and Life of the Abomination; And the Wind Howls...Wendigo!; And Now...The Wolverine!; Come on in, the Revolution's Fine
ComicInfo.Writer: Jeph Loeb,Len Wein,Roy Thomas,Jeph Loeb,Len Wein,Roy Thomas
